name: Ghost Economy (VNRPG demo)
description:
GHOST ECONOMY is a romantic-horror Visual Novel/RPG about creativity and cost.

C a n   y o u   c r e a t e   l o v e ? 

Reese is a drifter in the small town of Dundolk. He spends his time crafting the underground virtual puppet show SKELEVENTURE, and it seems nothing can steal him away from his work—until the coffee shop boy, Jalen, flirts with him. Take control of Reese's work and try to win Jalen's heart—without, hopefully, making a fool of yourself in the process.

It's based off a novel of the same name, which is also on itch.io and at various retailers worldwide.

This is a name-your-own-price prototype that reflects roughly four chapters of the original book. If you like the project and want to support the creator, please consider donating here via itch.io and/or check out Millard Crow's Patreon, Ko-Fi, and Twitch.
